SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR='0x0a'
) WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type_array;


-- USE THE openjson function to explode the array
SELECT 
    payment_type, 
    sub_type,
    value AS payment_type_desc_value
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
) WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type_array
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH (
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
)
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
WITH (
    sub_type SMALLINT,
    value VARCHAR(20)
)
